component.attributes:
&standard_uicomponent_attributes; &widget_var_attribute;
value false 0 java.lang.Integer Value of the progressbar.
minValue false 0 java.lang.Integer Minimum value of the bar, defaults to 0.
maxValue false 100 java.lang.Integer Maximum value of the bar, defaults to 100.
step false java.lang.Integer 10 Step factor value to be used when incrementing the value in client side progressbar.
width false java.lang.String Width of the bar, defaults to 200px.
height false java.lang.String Height of the bar, defaults to 20px.
direction false java.lang.String Direction of the progress, can be "ltr", "rtl", "ttb" or "btt".
effect false java.lang.String Type of the easing effect to be used when changing the progress value.
effectDuration false 1.0 java.lang.Double Duration of the effect in seconds, defaults to 1.
ajax false false java.lang.Boolean Specifies the mode of progressBar, in ajax mode progress value is retrieved from a backing bean. Defaults to false which is pure client side progressBar.
interval false 3000 java.lang.Integer Interval in seconds to do periodic requests in ajax mode.
style false java.lang.String Style of the main container of progressBar.
styleClass false java.lang.String Style class of the main container of progressBar.
oncompleteUpdate false java.lang.String Specifies the components to update with ajax after progress is completed.
completeListener false javax.el.MethodExpression void completeListener() A server side listener to invoke when progress is completed
